fields.name: Issues with your setup
fields.value:
You can easily spot issues in your setup by running `/ess version`

Make sure you have:
**- [EssentialsXChat](https://ci.ender.zone/job/EssentialsX/)**
**- [Vault](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/34315/)**
**- A permission plugin** (see `?lp`)

fields.name: Issues with LuckPerms
fields.value:
If the prefix/suffix is not correctly shown at `/lp user <user> info` it isn't properly configured in LuckPerms.

`/lp user <user> meta info` gives you more insight.
You can also go to the [LuckPerms Discord](https://discord.gg/LuckPerms) for further support
